description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cebk0","text":"Subcellular fractionation to isolate early and late endosomes (EEs and LEs) by performing a series of centrifugation steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8d6d0","text":"add 2.5 ml 0.45M sucrose on top of frozen buffer S3 and wait for   or until it frozen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2op73","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"C1974FA00BB111EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"anbk5","text":"keep the frozen tubes at -80 until experiment day","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"peap","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64pgu","text":"prepare 0.5M and 2M sucrose buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"99jbr","text":"prepare buffer S2 by mixing 0.5M and 2M sucrose at 1:2 and buffer S3 at 2:1 ratio ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"11fjb","text":"place Beckman ultracentrifuge tube (No.344059) on dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vl16","text":"add 2.5ml 2M sucrose in the tube and wait for   or until it frozen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"feees","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"B5F9FBC00BB111EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gehv","text":"add 2.5 ml buffer S2 on top of frozen 2M sucrose and wait for   or until it frozen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aeg1t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"ABA3CDE00BB111EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cubf2","text":"add 2.5 ml buffer S3 on top of frozen buffer S2 and wait for   or until it frozen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36dga","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"BD0B5EE00BB111EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29e5n","text":"place the frozen tubes at 4C for   or until defrosted before use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bnpcj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":18000,"guid":"D0A11A800BB111EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d028i","text":"Dissect striatum from mice, fresh freeze the tissue with dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnbd0","text":"Prepare homogenization buffer (HB): 150mM Nacl, 10mM HEPES, 1mM EGTA, 0.1M MgCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ns22","text":"Homogenize striatum tissue with 1ml HB containing 1x Halt protease and phosphatase inhibitor (EDTA-free) by Dounce homogenization on ice (30 strokes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ceo4","text":"Centrifugation  , 3,000g, 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"obu4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"E08C44B00BB111EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"albeh","text":"load postnuclear supernatants onto the top of continuous sucrose gradient ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21e4m","text":"Centrifugation  , 200,000g, 4C (Accel and Decel -\u003e slow)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e192l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":64800,"guid":"F0C911500BB111EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a45ob","text":"Collect fractions from top to bottom of the gradient","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aujc","text":"add equal volume of ice-cold 55% TCA and incubate on ice for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6m741","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"FAAD1C700BB111EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72jv7","text":"centrifugation  , 20,000g, 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ff7p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"043CED100BB211EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dd7l1","text":"wash pellet with 1ml ice-cold acetone centrifugation  , 20,000g, 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97d4p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"09A3FB900BB211EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pp2f","text":"  for 2 times. Total 3 washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1dpq2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1A5CFD100BB211EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"step_guid":"FBBF93500BB011EE88632512CD7220FD","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9mcqr","text":"resuspend pellet with 70ul of 1% SDS buffer (1% SDS, 10mMTris, 2mMEDTA) containing 1x Halt protease and phosphatase inhibitor (EDTA-free), sonication for   and followed by incubation on orbital shaker for 1hr at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":154,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ekg8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3,"guid":"14405A300BB211EE88632512CD7220FD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
